entry.title: Falling In Love Again
entry.summary:
Author: SterekTyrusGrizzamMalecfan2019

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,306Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 31

Summary: Derek Hale is the most respected History Professor, he earned a Ph.D in History of Civil Rights and Ph. D in LGBTQ+ Studies. Four and half years ago he was offered a Assistant Professor position at Harvard University a opportunity he could not pass which he accepted without notifying his family, friends, and his now ex fiancé Stiles. Five years late he has returned to Beacon Hills to accept a tenure track professor position at Beacon Hills University.

entry.title: For the Moon Goddess
entry.summary:
Author: ProLuna

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,910Chapters: 34/42Kudos: 109

Summary: Stiles is a new novice at the Beacon Hills Temple of the Moon Goddess, where the priests have forsworn all women and have ritual sex to make seminal offerings to their deity. In an AU where a moon cult is the dominant religion in an alternate fantasy-type world, Stiles navigates friendship, love, and a confusing priesthood that has way too many rules about sex for basically being Sex University.A lot of other pairings along the way, but from the beginning, this story is about how we get to Sterek.

entry.title: When You Call, I Will Come
entry.summary:
Author: auddity

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,418Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 4

Summary: “Okay, are you like, therapizing me or something?” Derek paused and turned to face him, “No, I’m not ‘therapizing’ you.” “Because you asked about me and Lydia, and now you’re just not answering,” Stiles explained. “Is that some trick you picked up in therapy?” Derek smirked, “Actually, it is a technique my therapist uses.” “Oh, so this is funny to you!” Stiles yelled, “My relationship is just a big joke to you, huh?” “No!” Derek assured him, “It’s not funny, I just think you could really use someone to talk to.” “And that person is you?” Stiles raised a skeptical brow. “Not necessarily,” Derek answered. “Ideally, you’d have your own therapist.”After the events of the show, Derek visits Stiles in DC. Derek started seeing a therapist and urges Stiles to do the same. Stiles may experience some revelations during Derek's visit, but he is not sold on the whole therapy thing...Rating is M for now, might change in the future.

entry.title: The Night We Met
entry.summary:
Author: TW_Queen (Queen_Whovian)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,348Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 17

Summary: Stiles blinked. He realized, abruptly, that his right hand was pressed against the man’s chest. The fluttering heartbeat was getting stronger with each passing moment. Stiles swallowed, “Are you— What do you… Are you saying he’s my… soulmate?”The woman tilted her head again, looking pensive. She nodded, “He is yours.” His. Yours. Mine. Stiles swallowed, feeling sick all over again. One night is enough to change your life. When hunters corner Derek in the Preserve and a mysterious force brings a Spark to his side, he finds it changes more than he'd care for.

entry.title: drop our anchors in a storm
entry.summary:
Author: sparassiss

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,490Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 17

Summary: “How did it go?” Derek deflects. He’ll talk about his day later, but Stiles needs him right now. He’s almost bursting to explode with it, knee still bouncing and limbs almost vibrating with energy. This is anxiety in its purest, most physical form, and Stiles’ pounding heart nearly drowns out his words when he speaks next.“It was — fuck, I’m so anxious I’m gonna combust,” Stiles laughs nervously, before he seems to choke on his own air and he coughs a little, eyebrows tilting in and face coloring, almost holding his breath unconsciously. His scent is far too bitter and Derek can’t stand it, has to fix it immediately.-Or, Stiles deals with social anxiety. Derek helps.

entry.title: The Beast That Wears the Man
entry.summary:
Author: asyndetonic

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 57,464Chapters: 7/15Kudos: 31

Summary: To be or not to be… a werewolf in Ancient Rome. An epic romance inspired by Shakespeare’s Hamlet set in the early Roman Empire. Blood and swords and scandals and bathhouses and togas, oh my. Stiles is the heir to Rome making his mark on the frontier of the empire when he encounters Derek, a mysterious barbarian who offers a way to military victory. They face battle, revenge, and imperial plots, and the love and loyalty that grows between them alters the course of history. Updates Mondays & Fridays.

In spite of the trauma associated with such genetic continuity, she stressed the importance of remembrance in all of its various forms. Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,544Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 759

Summary: Stiles Stilinski knew he should have stayed in to finish his assignment that was due on Monday. Instead, he had to go investigate with the pack. When he goes missing, the pack finds him in the same spot after days of searching.   Or the one where Stiles goes missing for a couple of days and comes back blind and with magical powers. What did that bitch do to him?   *This was first published in 2013 as a teenager. entry.title: A Flower Made Of Iron
entry.summary:
Author: XOLissy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,283,254Chapters: 40/?Kudos: 59

Summary: Eden Parker has learned how to survive by staying soft in a world that punishes it. Adopted young, raised in the quiet fractures of Mystic Falls, and carrying truths no one else can see, Eden moves through life balancing grief, loyalty, and a dangerous kind of hope. He loves deeply. He trusts carefully. And he has no idea how many forces—human and otherwise—are already watching him. When new friendships form, old wounds reopen, and the supernatural begins to bleed into the ordinary, Eden finds himself at the center of something far larger than a high-school existence should allow. Monsters lurk in forests and shadows. Love arrives when it shouldn’t. Protection becomes complicated. And the past—buried, sealed, and forgotten—refuses to stay quiet. Some bonds are chosen. Some are fated. And some are forged in pain, blood, and devotion. Disclaimer: I do not own the Vampire Diaries, Supernatural, Teen Wolf, Smallville, or The Originals. I do not own any of the characters besides Eden Parker and Ben Monroe. All rights reserved to the writers.
